I need some help when I try to burn the image using Nero burner, a message pop up saying "problems with loading cue sheet"

Anyone else got this problem?
Hey guys we need seeds, too many people stuck @ 99.8% so please seed!
Hi, I have the same problem trying to burn an image. Anyone else have any luck? I was looking forward to trying this game.

Heres the solution to the problems you'll get with the image: Open the .cue file with a text editor like notepad and look at the line that says "FILE". Delete the text after "razor1911" but leave the ".bin" at the end, so the full line in inverted commas reads "Combat_Mission_Afrika_Korps.Razor1911.bin"

Save it and it will work.
thanks a lot plasma. it realy worked
